item.title: Vectors/3D Graphics help please?
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Okay, I’m starting to move toward having a game in 3D, even if it is only a 3D box. So far I have this code to draw a simple 3D box:

[code] public void paint(Graphics g) {

	drawGrid(g);
}

public void drawGrid(Graphics g) {

	int i = gridsize / 2;
	g.drawRect(pcxpos, pcypos, modelsize, modelsize);
	g.drawRect(pcxpos + i, pcypos + i, modelsize, modelsize);
	g.drawLine(pcxpos, pcypos, pcxpos + i, pcypos + i);
	g.drawLine(pcxpos + gridsize, pcypos, pcxpos + gridsize + i, pcypos + i);
	g.drawLine(pcxpos + gridsize, pcypos + gridsize, pcxpos + gridsize + i, pcypos + gridsize + i);
	g.drawLine(pcxpos, pcypos + gridsize, pcxpos + i, pcypos + gridsize + i);
}[/code]

As you can see, the drawGrid method is extremely messy, and I would like to organize it to where I could ultimatley use a constructor on it. Help appreciated!
